original_title: Zelensky ready for ‘some compromise’ on whether a ceasefire happens before Putin talks as Russia plays down prospects | CNN
article_summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is willing to compromise on his demand for a ceasefire before talks with Russia, provided security guarantees for Ukraine are established. However, Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has poured cold water on the idea of a leaders' summit and suggested that Ukraine is impeding further talks.</s>
